thread.title: Noel Fuentes Appointed Director of Software Engineering For Rakuten Super Logistics

author: cnbc.com
title: Noel Fuentes Appointed Director of Software Engineering For Rakuten Super Logistics
text:
LAS VEGAS, Rakuten Super Logistics (RSL), the national leader in eCommerce order fulfillment, today announced that Noel Fuentes has been appointed Director of Software Engineering for RSL.
"I am pleased to welcome Noel as our Director of Software Engineering," said Mike Manzione, Chief Executive Officer of RSL. "As an industry leader—and in keeping with our commitment to provide an optimal customer experience—we're proud to have an IT professional of Noel's caliber join our management team."
As Director of Software Engineering, Fuentes will provide leadership/management of software development, business systems analysis and project management teams; he will also oversee software product delivery in support of RSL's business goals, and oversee adherence to software development lifecycle methodologies/processes.
"We're thrilled to welcome Noel to our IT leadership team," said Gene Valaquin, RSL's VP, Information Technology. "RSL is pursuing a rigorous technology agenda, and we look forward to the thought leadership Noel will undoubtedly contribute."
As an experienced IT industry leader, Noel brings with him an impressive professional history.
Prior to joining RSL, Noel served as Director, Software Development for Global Experience Specialists, leading the company's software engineering and support of customer-facing products/applications. His previous tenures include Director, Software Development for Station Casinos, Software Engineering Manager for IGT Interactive, and Software Development Manager for Cantor Gaming.
As Director of Software Engineering, Fuentes said that he looks forward to partnering with the company's IT professionals as they build upon RSL's expanding technology efforts.
"I'm excited to join the management team at RSL, an acknowledged national leader in the fulfillment and logistics market," Fuentes said. "I'm looking forward to working with our team of highly-skilled technology professionals, helping ensure RSL's continued success."
About Rakuten Super Logistics
Founded in 2001, Rakuten Super Logistics (RSL) is a leader in ecommerce order fulfillment, assisting leading ecommerce retailers to increase speed of delivery, improve order accuracy, decrease shipping costs, and increase customer satisfaction. RSL's cloud-based fulfillment platform for order and inventory management features integration with popular ecommerce platforms, and automatic order importing from online marketplaces, including: Amazon, Magento, WalMart Marketplace, and Shopify. RSL's 2-Day Delivery Network of wholly owned and operated fulfillment centers allows for 1-2 day delivery via ground shipping to 98 percent of the U.S.
